mission: To institutionalize global good by establishing standardized CSR measurement, facilitating CSI education and support, and advocating for accounting reforms recognizing social value.
vision: A world where corporate citizenship is transparently measured, socially impactful, and financially incentivized through global standards and accounting reforms.
audiences: South African citizens with civic duty
International financial and accounting standard bodies

programs.name: Global CSR Measurement Framework
programs.summary: Develop a transparent, public-valued CSR measurement system aligned with GRI and UN SDGs.

programs.name: CSI Measurement, Education, and Support
programs.summary: Provide education and tools to help organizations strategically manage and measure CSI activities.

programs.name: Goodwill Accounting Reform Advocacy
programs.summary: Advocate for revising accounting standards to recognize social value in goodwill calculations.

objectives: Establish a global, public-valued CSR measurement framework.
Facilitate CSI measurement, education, and capacity building.
Advocate for revising 'Goodwill' accounting to reflect societal value.
proof_points: PBO structure formalizes civic duty with legal and governance frameworks.
Alignment with Global Reporting Initiative Standards and UN Sustainable Development Goals.
Utilization of SROI Network Methodology and ISO 26000 guidance for social responsibility.
Engagement with IASB and FASB for international financial reporting reforms.
primary_ctas: Join the initiative for global CSR standardization.
Participate in CSI education and capacity building programs.
Support advocacy for accounting reforms recognizing social value.
